Articles.Content:
KSP 1.0.5.1028 (32bit build)

Windows 7 64bit

Mods:

Chatterer, ChuteSafetyIndicator, Contract Configurator, Contract Pack: Field Research, Crowd Sourced Science, Drogue Chute Plus, KAS, KIS, Kerbal Engineer, Kerbal Joint Reinforcement, MechJeb, Science Alert, Smart Parts, Surface Lights, Trigger Tech, Waypoint Manager

I just timed my load and it took 32 minutes. This is ridiculous. The first thing to load is chatterer and that takes several minutes by itself. It looks like it's all the mods that are taking forever. Once the loading got into the Squad folders it sped up to what looked like normal load speed.

I have updated or at least insured most mods are up to date but some mods I couldn't find (verify current release). I know one mod is giving a warning that I'm using an unsupported build.

It might be the network adapter issue. Try disabling any unused ones (Hamachi is the most likely culprit but there are other possibilities) and see if that helps

Edited February 1, 2016 by xEvilReeperx
I love you right now! That was it!
